remarks: A ring element plus itself is two times the element.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngo2 $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> E. x e. X ( A G A ) = ( ( x G x ) H A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
